title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enabling government to streamline & ensure healthcare coverage with data-WPS208
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过数据帮助政府简化并确保医疗保险覆盖-WPS208
abstract: Covered California serves nearly 14 million residents, where success depends on data — verified, analyzed, and activated at scale. In this session, learn how Covered California uses AWS to power identity verification with AI/ML, automate call center operations with agentic technologies, and build data pipelines that pinpoint citizens and residents most at risk of losing healthcare coverage. Attendees will walk away with a blueprint for using Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL, Databricks on AWS, Amazon Connect, and AI/ML services to turn complex, regulated datasets into actionable insights. The session highlights architectures, automation approaches, and lessons learned to help government leaders unlock data as the enabler of secure, citizen-focused innovation.
abstract_cn: Covered California 为近 1400 万居民提供服务，其成功取决于大规模验证、分析和激活的数据。在本次会议中，了解 Covered California 如何使用 AWS 通过 AI/ML 支持身份验证，利用代理技术自动化呼叫中心运营，并构建数据管道以精准识别最有可能失去医疗保险覆盖的公民和居民。与会者将获得使用 Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL、Databricks on AWS、Amazon Connect 和 AI/ML 服务将复杂的受监管数据集转化为可操作洞察的蓝图。本次会议重点介绍架构、自动化方法和经验教训，帮助政府领导者将数据作为安全、以公民为中心的创新推动力。
